title: Deviled Eggs
instructions: Place eggs in single layer in saucepan. Cover with water. Bring to boil over high heat. Remove from heat, cover, and let stand 12 minutes. Drain and place in ice water until cool. Peel eggs and slice in half lengthwise. Remove yolks and place in bowl. Mash yolks with fork. Add mayonnaise, relish, mustard, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Spoon or pipe filling into egg white halves. Sprinkle with paprika. Refrigerate until serving.
